    Methane Tracking.

    Simplified.


    Integral Earth harnesses the power of the Integrated Methane Inversion (IMI), which uses transparent research-grade algorithms and public satellite observations to quantify and monitor methane.


    Integral Earth will vastly simplify the process of tracking methane emissions by allowing users to submit paramaters using a simple web interface and receive actionable data in return.

    Our mission is to make our emission monitoring platform accessible to everyone, from policymakers to industry stakeholders to envirommental organizations. We believe that accessing trustworthy emissions data shouldn't require extensive scientific or programmatic knowledge.
